chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: TeleStax is pleased to announce the release of &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; &THIS.VERSION;. &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; is the first and only Java based Open Source USSD Gateway implementation that is fully tested and supported by TeleStax.

&THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; strictly adheres to the standards and specifications defined by the International Telecommunications Union (ITU). It is an easy-to-install and easy-to-deploy platform based on the robust and proven &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE 1.1 Server and &THIS.PLATFORM; jSS7 Stack. It can be installed on any Operating System that supports Java (JDK 7 and SCTP).

&THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; comes with a Graphical User Interface that will allow you to configure, monitor and manage the Gateway through a convenient user-friendly interface. There is also a powerful Command Line Tool (CLI) for efficient management and easy configuration.
&THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; comes with full support for Network Push functionality.
Enterprises can now use &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; with the added assurance that the product is fully supported by TeleStax.
